channel.title: Terraria is out!
channel.description:
Get your copy of Terraria now at [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/105600/]Steam![/url] It costs €9.99 and by seeing the trailer and some LP's i think it's certainly worth it.
I posted here because it's kinda an announcement. Move if you wish.
OR d-load the cracked non updated version for windows here! http://dl.dropbox.com/u/14922850/terraria.rar

item.title: Terraria is out!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Yeah if you use cheats they mess up the multiplayer for you (your character is flagged as a cheater).

Read full topic

item.title: Terraria is out!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Why do you use inv edit, the whole point of terraria (imho) was to go around gathering resources and eventually go monster hunting… Then when I finish my dungeon run, I start over on a new map.

Read full topic

item.title: Terraria is out!
item.dc:creator: @piggle piggle
item.description:
@piggle wrote:

i got it, i loved it, my only problem with it is the biginning, its too slow, and i had no idea what to do, or how to get people into my house, my friend had to come onto my server and help me…
also, the invintory edits are nice but some cheep people charge for the cheats D:

Read full topic

item.title: Terraria is out!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:14, topic:395323”]Just watched some youtube videos and the first thing that came to mind when i saw it was maplestory…

Yea this is the type of game that doesnt appeal to me so meh.[/quote]
It needs some getting used to but once you actually play it it starts getting awesome.

The cracked version is not updated however.
